thread.section_title: Crosti Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful Hotel - Review of Crosti Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Richard S
title: Wonderful Hotel
text: We stayed at the hotel for 2 nights. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. The room, lobby, and breakfast area were all spotless. Great location for us (near the train terminal), with excellent restaurants close by. We thoroughly enjoyed it and will definitely stay there again. Highly recommend!
